description: Creates a version of the guardrail. Use this API to create a snapshot of the guardrail when you are satisfied with a configuration, or to compare the configuration with another version.

parameters.name: guardrailIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the guardrail. This can be an ID or the ARN.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than once. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency in the Amazon S3 User Guide. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: guardrailId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the guardrail.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The number of the version of the guardrail.
